item.title: Narcotics worth Rs 1.26 lakh, seized in 13 separate cases in Raichur, destroyed by police
item.description:
<![CDATA[Cab driver dies by suicide after setting himself on fire in Bengaluru 24-01-2025 ¦ 24-01-2025 IST
24-01-2025 ¦ 24-01-2025 IST
Representational Image
Bengaluru, Jan 24 (PTI): A 39-year-old cab driver died by suicide after setting himself on fire with kerosene outside his estranged wife's house here over family feud, police said on Friday.
The deceased has been identified as Manjunath, who hailed from Tumakuru, they said.
The incident occurred on Thursday night in an area that comes under J...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi

item.title: Man in Raichur held for duping farmer of Rs 28 lakh with promise of treasure
item.description:
<![CDATA[Man in Raichur held for duping farmer of Rs 28 lakh with promise of treasure
Vartha Bharati | 24-01-2025 | 13:35:00 IST
Raichur: Hatti Police have uncovered a fraud case where a man in Lingasuguru taluk was duped of Rs 28 lakh under the false promise of uncovering hidden treasure. The accused has been arrested.
The arrested man, identified as Sharanappa (42), a resident of Udukal village in Gangavathi taluk, allegedly visited Allasab of Kotha village on May 22, 2023. He convinced Allasab ...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi

item.title: Raichur woman sends mangalsutra to Parameshwara, seeks justice for husband
